languages.text: "По ту сторону {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зева{/g} что-то происходит, Лорд-капитан. Что-то бесконечно зловещее, что-то катастрофическое. Обрывки мыслеобразов, доносящихся из Империума, несут печать пагубы. Образы, звучащие оттуда, похожи на скалящуюся пасть".

traits.locale_text: "По ту сторону {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зева{/g} что-то происходит, Лорд-капитан. Что-то бесконечно зловещее, что-то катастрофическое. Обрывки мыслеобразов, доносящихся из Империума, несут печать пагубы. Образы, звучащие оттуда, похожи на скалящуюся пасть".

languages.text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

"Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

languages.text: «Ocurre algo al otro lado de las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g}, Lord Capitán. Algo tan siniestro que desafía toda comprensión. Algo catastrófico. Los retazos de imágenes mentales que nos llegan desde el Imperium portan la marca de la perdición. Las imágenes que emanan directamente de allí acarrean la sensación de una bestia mostrando los colmillos».
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

traits.locale_text: «Ocurre algo al otro lado de las Fauces, Lord Capitán. Algo tan siniestro que desafía toda comprensión. Algo catastrófico. Los retazos de imágenes mentales que nos llegan desde el Imperium portan la marca de la perdición. Las imágenes que emanan directamente de allí acarrean la sensación de una bestia mostrando los colmillos».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}の向こうで何かが起こっている、ロード・キャプテン。とてつもなく禍々しい何か…破滅的な何かが。帝国から届く心のイメージの欠片には、破滅の跡が見られた。そこから浮かんでくる映像は、まるで獣が牙を剥いているようだった」
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

traits.locale_text: 「マウの向こうで何かが起こっている、ロード・キャプテン。とてつもなく禍々しい何か…破滅的な何かが。帝国から届く心のイメージの欠片には、破滅の跡が見られた。そこから浮かんでくる映像は、まるで獣が牙を剥いているようだった」

languages.text: “舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}的另一端发生了某些事情。是某些极其险恶的动荡，某些灾难性的事故。从帝国传到我们意识中的影像碎片带着灾变的印记，那些图像仿佛露出尖牙的凶兽一样。”
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，巨口的另一端发生了某些事情。是某些极其险恶的动荡，某些灾难性的事故。从帝国传到我们意识中的影像碎片带着灾变的印记，那些图像仿佛露出尖牙的凶兽一样。”
“舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}的另一端发生了某些事情。是某些极其险恶的动荡，某些{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}灾难性{/g}的事故。从帝国传到我们意识中的影像碎片带着灾变的印记，那些图像仿佛露出尖牙的凶兽一样。”

languages.text: "Auf der anderen Seite des {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlunds{/g} ist etwas im Gange, Lord Captain. Etwas endlos Düsteres. Etwas Desaströses. Die Fragmente mentaler Bilder, die uns aus dem Imperium erreichen, tragen das Zeichen des Untergangs. Die Bilder sind wie eine Bestie, die ihre Zähne fletscht."
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

traits.locale_text: "Auf der anderen Seite des Schlunds ist etwas im Gange, Lord Captain. Etwas endlos Düsteres. Etwas Desaströses. Die Fragmente mentaler Bilder, die uns aus dem Imperium erreichen, tragen das Zeichen des Untergangs. Die Bilder sind wie eine Bestie, die ihre Zähne fletscht."

"Auf der anderen Seite des Schlunds ist etwas im Gange, Lord Captain. Etwas endlos Düsteres. Etwas Desaströses. Die Fragmente mentaler Bilder, die uns aus dem Imperium erreichen, tragen das Zeichen des Untergangs. Die Bilder sind wie eine Bestie, die ihre Zähne fletscht."

languages.text: « Quelque chose se trame de l'autre côté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g}, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quelque chose de particulièrement sinistre. Un désastre en devenir. Les bribes d'images mentales qui nous parviennent de l'Imperium portent la marque de la fatalité. Elles sont pareilles à une bête qui montre les crocs. »
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose se trame de l'autre côté de la Gueule, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quelque chose de particulièrement sinistre. Un désastre en devenir. Les bribes d'images mentales qui nous parviennent de l'Imperium portent la marque de la fatalité. Elles sont pareilles à une bête qui montre les crocs. »

« Quelque chose se trame de l'autre côté de la Gueule, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quelque chose de particulièrement sinistre. Un désastre en devenir. Les bribes d'images mentales qui nous parviennent de l'Imperium portent la marque de la fatalité. Elles sont pareilles à une bête qui montre les crocs. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız{/g}'ın öte tarafından bir şeyler yaklaşıyor Lord Kaptan. Ebedî bir uğursuzluk taşıyan, felakete sürükleyecek türden bir şey... İmparatorluk'tan bize ulaşan zihinsel görüntülerin parçaları, kıyametin izlerini taşıyor. Oradan yayılan görüntüler, âdeta dişlerini açığa çıkaran bir yaratığı andırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Something is afoot on the other side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}, Lord Captain. Something infinitely sinister. Something disastrous. The scraps of mental images that reach us from the Imperium carry the mark of doom. The images emanating from there are like a beast baring its teeth."
